alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued December 24 at 3:53AM ChST until December 27 at 6:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK FROM 6PM TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 7 to 9 feet and dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...East facing reefs. * WHEN...6PM this evening through Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The high rip current risk is expected to persist along east facing reefs through the weekend. North reefs exposed to a northeast direction may see a high rip risk as well.
info.instruction: If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
